exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "T2M a" in the current goal.

tactic: destruct b as [b | b]; [reflexivity | contradiction H2].
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 1 branch or a conjunctive pattern made of 2 patterns.

original: intros a b H1 H2. unfold eqTerm, plusTerm. rewrite H1. destruct b as [b | b]; [reflexivity | contradiction H2].
